ignore.name: wininit.exe
ignore.comment: Windows Initialization - system critical

ignore.name: winlogon.exe
ignore.comment: Windows Logon - system critical

ignore.name: csrss.exe
ignore.comment: Client/Server Runtime - system critical

ignore.name: smss.exe
ignore.comment: Session Manager - system critical

ignore.name: services.exe
ignore.comment: Service Control Manager - system critical

ignore.name: lsass.exe
ignore.comment: Local Security Authority - system critical

ignore.name: svchost.exe
ignore.comment: Service Host (multiple instances) - system critical

ignore.name: System
ignore.comment: Kernel process - system critical

ignore.name: explorer.exe
ignore.comment: Windows Shell - needed for desktop UI

ignore.name: dwm.exe
ignore.comment: Desktop Window Manager - required for graphics

ignore.name: fontdrvhost.exe
ignore.comment: Font Driver Host - required for fonts

ignore.name: audiodg.exe
ignore.comment: Audio Device Graph - required for sound

ignore.name: spoolsv.exe
ignore.comment: Print Spooler - system, can be stopped if not printing

ignore.name: winmgmt
ignore.comment: Windows Management Instrumentation - system critical

ignore.name: WmiPrvSE.exe
ignore.comment: WMI Provider Host - system critical

ignore.name: taskhostw.exe
ignore.comment: Task Host - system critical

ignore.name: rundll32.exe
ignore.comment: DLL Loader - used by many system tasks

ignore.name: msmpeng.exe
ignore.comment: Windows Defender - system, can be disabled for gaming but not recommended

ignore.name: MsMpEng.exe
ignore.comment: Variant of MS Defender executable that resides under Program Data\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Platform

ignore.name: MpDefenderCoreService.exe
ignore.comment: Windows Defender Core Service that possibly stops tampering

ignore.name: NisSrv.exe
ignore.comment: Network Inspection Service - part of Windows Defender

ignore.name: RtkAudUService64.exe
ignore.comment: Realtek Audio Universal Service - required for Realtek UWP audio drivers with Dolby support

ignore.name: logi_lamparray_service.exe
ignore.comment: Provides HID LampArray Lighting support to Logitech devices

ignore.name: amdpmfservice.exe
ignore.comment: AMD PMF Service - required for AMD power management features

ignore.name: amdfendrsr.exe
ignore.comment: AMD Crash Defender Service - required for AMD graphics features

ignore.name: atiesrxx.exe
ignore.comment: AMD External Events Service - required for AMD graphics features

ignore.name: atieclxx.exe
ignore.comment: AMD External Events Client Module - required for AMD graphics features

ignore.name: NvContainer.exe
ignore.comment: NVIDIA Container - required for NVIDIA graphics features

ignore.name: NvContainerLocalSystem.exe
ignore.comment: NVIDIA Local System Container - required for NVIDIA graphics features

ignore.name: NvDisplay.Container.exe
ignore.comment: NVIDIA Display Container - required for NVIDIA graphics features

ignore.name: IAStorDataMgrSvc.exe
ignore.comment: Intel Rapid Storage Technology Service - required for Intel storage features

ignore.name: IntelCpHDCPSvc.exe
ignore.comment: Intel Content Protection HECI Service - required for Intel DRM features

ignore.name: IntelCpHeciSvc.exe
ignore.comment: Intel HECI Service - required for Intel management features

ignore.name: RtkAudioService64.exe
ignore.comment: Realtek Audio Service - required for Realtek audio features

ignore.name: AmdPpkgSvc.exe
ignore.comment: Manages AMD provisioning packages, including processor and NVMe power management. Required for AMD CPU power management

safelist.name: OneDrive.exe
safelist.comment: OneDrive sync - safe to suspend if not using OneDrive

safelist.name: SearchIndexer.exe
safelist.comment: Windows Search Indexer - safe to suspend for gaming

safelist.name: WSearch
safelist.comment: Windows Search service - safe to stop for gaming

safelist.name: SysMain
safelist.comment: Superfetch - can be disabled for gaming

safelist.name: wuauserv
safelist.comment: Windows Update - can be stopped temporarily

safelist.name: spoolsv.exe
safelist.comment: Print Spooler - safe to stop if not printing

safelist.name: bthserv
safelist.comment: Bluetooth services - safe to stop if not using Bluetooth

safelist.name: WerFault.exe
safelist.comment: Windows Error Reporting - safe to suspend

safelist.name: RemoteRegistry
safelist.comment: Remote Registry - safe to stop if not using remote management

safelist.name: msmpeng.exe
safelist.comment: Windows Defender - safe to stop if using third-party AV

safelist.name: wmpnetwk.exe
safelist.comment: Windows Media Player Network Sharing Service - safe to stop

safelist.name: Fax
safelist.comment: Fax service - safe to stop if not using fax

safelist.name: TabletInputService
safelist.comment: Tablet PC Input Service - safe to stop if not using tablet features

safelist.name: wisvc
safelist.comment: Windows Insider Service - safe to stop if not in Insider program

safelist.name: vmms.exe
safelist.comment: Hyper-V Virtual Machine Management - safe to stop if not using virtualization

safelist.name: vmcompute.exe
safelist.comment: Hyper-V Compute Service - safe to stop if not using virtualization

safelist.name: w3wp.exe
safelist.comment: IIS Worker Process - safe to stop if not running web server

safelist.name: sqlservr.exe
safelist.comment: SQL Server - safe to stop if not using local DB

safelist.name: Docker Desktop
safelist.comment: Docker Desktop - safe to stop if not using containers

safelist.name: Teams.exe
safelist.comment: Microsoft Teams - safe to stop if not in use

safelist.name: Spotify.exe
safelist.comment: Spotify - safe to stop if not listening to music

safelist.name: Zoom.exe
safelist.comment: Zoom Workspace - safe to stop if not in use

safelist.name: Discord.exe
safelist.comment: Discord - safe to stop if not in use

safelist.name: Slack.exe
safelist.comment: Slack - safe to stop if not in use

safelist.name: Podman.exe
safelist.comment: Podman - safe to stop if not using containers

safelist.name: CrossDeviceResume.exe
safelist.comment: Cross-Device Resume - safe to stop if not using cross-device features

safelist.name: AdobeARM.exe
